text:
(a)     Rights and Obligations. The rights and obligations of domestic partners to each other are those described by Section 
62.2, Definitions or otherwise granted by San Francisco law or policies. 
     (b)     Duration of Rights and Duties. If a domestic partnership ends, the partners incur no further obligations to each other. 
(Added by Proposition K, 11/6/90; amended by Ord. 78-04, File No. 040318, App. 5/6/2004)

heading.catch_text: LEGAL EFFECT OF DECLARATION OF DOMESTIC PARTNERSHIP.
